attributes.action: Allow those 16+ to vote in the next General Election
attributes.background:
Messy Brexit. A pandemic. Climate change. It's clear 16 year olds aren't the ones with issues voting. With an uncertain future, let's all have a say in it. Most in their later teens are citizens who contribute either economically or socially. So let those 
16+ vote in the next general election.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598399
